Deputy CEO and General Counsel of G Capital, formerly known as Injazat Capital, one of the Middle Eastâ€™s foremost Islamic private equity investors, advisers and fund managers, providing capital and strategic support for growth companies. With a 10-year track record of top-performing investments and fund management specialising in TMT, Islamic Finance, Energy, Healthcare, Energy and Consumer Investments, G Capital was one of the pioneers in the Middle East in venture capital and private equity.

Founder and Co-Chairman of Conservatives Abroad Dubai and Northern Emirates and the Vice Chairman of Gulf Tories, the umbrella organisation for the Conservatives Abroad branches in the Gulf.

David holds directorships in several leading regional technology companies and Islamic financial institutions. He is a business mentor for Seed Start-up, a Dubai based start-up accelerator and seed stage venture capital fund. He is also the founder and Co-Chairman of Conservatives Abroad Dubai and the Vice Chairman of Gulf Tories and the founder of the HCU Trust.
